title: Send Me Your T206 Wantlists - cards are in hand - will be shipped today 11/30
author: btcarfagno

posts.post_title: Send Me Your T206 Wantlists - cards are in hand - will be shipped today 11/30
posts.post_content:
On Saturday I will be scanning and documenting a new to the hobby collection of over 300 T206 cards. A few things to keep in mind regarding the cards that will be available for purchase:

There are no rare backs. Rarest backs would be a few Sovereign and EPDG cards.

Condition runs the gamut from poor to EX. Majority would be good to VG/EX.

Commons, stars, HOF, major HOF all available including all four Cobbs.

Those who send me their wantlists will get right of first refusal on cards within the collection. You will also get scans and pricing before the cards are posted to Net54. The order that I receive the wantlists will be the order of preference on a card by card basis.

Please be sure to state the condition that you are looking for. I don't want to hold a card in GD if you are only looking for EX or better.

Great opportunity to get your foot in the door on your needs from a new to market collection.

Tom C

All cards in VG/EX or better:

Cobb-Green
Speaker
W. Johnson - Portrait
Cy Young  - Portrait
Mathewson - White Cap
O'Hara - St. Louis
Wheat
G. Davis

Thanks,

O'Hara NY
Any condition.
Thanks ... Steve
[url]arkansas2014@gmail.com[/url]
Could be a great way to start my T206 Cubs collection...Let me know what Cubbies you have available, any condition will be fine...
If you have one of the elusive centered Red Cobb Portraits, I’d be interested. Actually any centered Cobb, Marty, Cy for that matter. Thank you.

Backs

Congrats on the find and good luck with the sales Tom.

I’d like to get a look at any Baltimore cards GD or better.

Tony

PM Sent.

Dave
Cobb green
PM Sent

I am working on a spreadsheet for all of the want lists I have received both in this post and via PM's. Responding either way is perfectly fine. I will have everything in the order it was received and that will be the order for the items being available for right of refusal. 

Please note that these are not my cards. I feel that the best way to get the gentleman the most money is to sell the cards for him on commission. That way he can maximize what he gets out of it.

I HOPE...key word....hope....to have the images and prices ready on Sunday. 

Tom C
PM Sent
I just sent you a PM, the file you sent me on the google drive does not identify the correct cards it list 4 cards that I did not request.  Please review my pm of a few minutes ago.

Hold tight for the scans everyone. The cards weren't exactly in alphabetical order when I got here, so will have to wait until I get home to see out the scans. But this pic of some (some) of them should wet your whistle.

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/2016/IMG_20171118_102218021_zpsh5sbyzvl.jpg[/IMG]

Tom C
Back home now. Scans to start uploading shortly.

[quote name="btcarfagno" post=1721488]Back home now. Scans to start uploading shortly.[/QUOTE]

You the man...

FREE TIP OF THE DAY...Get those Die Hard movies going and that scanning will feel like nothing...
Speaking of Die Hard, I’m actually in the market for a Hans Gruber portrait (any back, any grade) :D

[quote name="MailboxBaseball" post=1721547]Speaking of Die Hard, I’m actually in the market for a Hans Gruber portrait (any back, any grade) :D[/QUOTE]

I've been hyping up these Die Hard flicks since yesterday. Pretty sure I am going to have to toss one on tonight...
Pm sent
Working on pricing now.

Half way through pricing and I am beat. Hope to get pricing out to everyone tomorrow night. Sorry for the delay. Been a long day.

Tom C

Tom,
Those cards are beautiful!!!! I also noticed some of those got rare backs. Nice!
I only saw the 1 Red Cobb PB in the file, did not see the other Cobbs.
PM Sent Tom, thanks

Yeah. He had told me he all all four Cobb's but turned out to be just the one unfortunately. He has some stuff from other sets as well. You should see his 33 Goudey Green Ruth.

Tom C

That's ok Tom,
but that Ruth 33 might be of some interest to me, based on pics & price. Sent you a PM w/ my email

want the following backs of any Highlanders......

Second tier backs - Old Mill, Polar Bear and Sovereign.
Third tier backs - *American Beauty, Cycle, El Principe De Gales, Hindu and Tolstoi

let me know what you got !!!

Almost done...hopefully by 9:00 EST or just after I will send out the pricelist with instructions.

Tom C

Price lists sent.

Anyone who has sent me a PM or replied in this thread since the original group I will get you going tomorrow.

Please note that the back scans for scan group one got mirrored, so the top left front scan matches the top right back scan. This was the only one I screwed up this badly.

Also note that one of the later scan groups included a Waddell portrait front scan with no back scan. This was a reprint that he had as a filler in his collection and forgot to remove.

Tom C

Got the price list - THANK YOU!!
Where do I send my "wish list" based on prices for what I requested?

[quote name="Moose117" post=1721933]Got the price list - THANK YOU!!
Where do I send my "wish list" based on prices for what I requested?[/QUOTE]

Send me a PM. If you had 50 cards on your wantlist and are interested in all 50 after seeing the prices, even if you plan on whittling that number down list all of the ones you want, list them. When it comes your turn whatever is left you will have the option on them. 

Also, if after seeing the scans and prices you are interested in other cards let me know that as well. Just please do so on a separate list.

Tom C
DID not get price list - and I am 2nd on a bunch of cards - don’t want to hold people up
I haven't received my price list yet...

PM sent.
Do I just play the waiting game now?
Thanks again!

[quote name="btcarfagno" post=1721935]Send me a PM. If you had 50 cards on your wantlist and are interested in all 50 after seeing the prices, even if you plan on whittling that number down list all of the ones you want, list them. When it comes your turn whatever is left you will have the option on them. 

Also, if after seeing the scans and prices you are interested in other cards let me know that as well. Just please do so on a separate list.

Tom C[/QUOTE]

Please note that the pricelists were posted to your individual Google Drive files where the scans are as well.

Tom C

Tom -- Just want to say a big thanks to you for taking this huge project on.
I know everyone on the board appreciates having a run at this find.

Because you're doing this the right way, giving over 50 members their shot in order, I'm sure this is going to take quite some time to settle out.  
Hopefully we can all remember that, and be patient to a fault as this runs its course.

This kind of thing is what makes Net54 so great -- Thanks again!!

Tom,

So, say for example that I am #3 in line for a card. How do I know when the two people in front of me have decided to pass and that it becomes my turn to buy?

Thanks :D

[quote name="btcarfagno" post=1721968]Please note that the pricelists were posted to your individual Google Drive files where the scans are as well.

Tom C[/QUOTE]

Anyone should be able to follow the link and view the prices and scans. It should be accessible without a Google account...

This is a great event for the forum, like a little party. It is top notch...

I would love to see an event like this taken to the next level...Video web series documenting the entire thing...Or even periodic live streams of the breakdown and whatnot...

Hi Tom did you get my PM ?


Patrick
Just got the link in a PM - thanks Tom!   Going to be hard to get any work done the rest of the day...

Just in case anyone isn't familiar with the search feature. You can hit CTRL+F and it pops up a box to search.
